testsuite.name: MIS Leave Management > View Request Status

testcase.name: Navigate to Leave Management > View Request Status tab > Work From Home
Verify Date Range field is present for WFH Tab
Enter Invalid Date Range for WFH Tab
Enter Valid Date Range for WFH Tab
Click on Export Options Option for WFH Tab
Click on Print Option for WFH Tab
Click on Copy Option for WFH Tab
Click on Excel Option for WFH Tab
Verify PDF option for WFH Tab
Verify Number of Entries displayed for WFH Tab
Enter WFH Period Name in Search Box for WFH Tab
